name: Falling Struggle
description:
This is my first ever Game Jam entry made for GMTK Jam 2020 with the theme "Out of Control".

As I am still new to programming I struggled a lot and had no time left to balance, create 2 or 3 good levels, and let's not speak about polish.

Half way through I recognized I shot way above my abilities for the timeframe, so everything fall apart and I had to stitch together what I had to at least get to a somewhat finished product.

If you took the time to look at my project, thanks a lot!
